text: Wish is the ninth studio album by English gothic rock band The Cure and released on 21 April 1992 through Fiction Records. It topped the album charts in Australia and the United Kingdom, number 2 in Belgium, Ireland, the United States and number 3 in New Zealand and was commercially successful in the band's career. ==Track listing== All songs composed by the Cure (Perry Bamonte, Simon Gallup, Robert Smith, Porl Thompson, Boris Williams). Lost Wishes EP Four instrumental tracks taken from the Wish sessions at the Manor Winter 1991. Released in 1994 as a limited edition cassette, through mail order only. === 2022 Deluxe Edition === == References == Category:1992 albums Category:The Cure albums
title: Wish (The Cure album)
